articles.author: Jenni Reid
articles.title: Inflation remains sticky in Europe, with core prices cooling less than expected - CNBC
articles.description: The headline figure previously came in at 2.8% in January, with further easing expected after price rises cooled in Germany, France and Spain.
articles.content:
Inflation in the 20-nation euro zone eased to 2.6% in February, flash figures showed on Friday, but both the headline and core figures were higher than expected.
Economists polled by Reuters had for… [+1550 chars]
